column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Terrible food. The ambient is great
column2: service is good too but the food is terrible. The best thing I had there was the glass of water I had. I believe I ordered tortilla espanola not hashbrowns
column3: patatas bravas were potato wedges with Cajun spices not bravas
column6: salmon was very fishy. Will never return
